description: Sets the acceleration used to modify the speed.
The number of counts generated by the encoder for one full revolution.
Sets the closed loop control mode.
The amount of time to wait after a stall/displacement condition,in milliseconds.
The number of full steps required for the motor to complete one revolution.
The device address.
The device will send alert messages when this setting is 1.
The device includes checksums in its messages if this setting is set to 1.

Reverse the motor driver output direction.

Sets the movement direction for the knob.
Sets how far the device moves with each step of the knob in displacement mode,in units of microsteps.
disable the use of the knob when set to 0.
The maximum speed that can be reached using the knob in velocity mode.
Sets the mode of the knob. 0 for velocity mode,1 for displacement mode.
Sets the profile to be used per increment when in velocity mode.
